monster.name: Shadow's Hand Rogue
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Syndicate (Duplicate)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target., thrown 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Trained in the use of poison, assassins are remorseless killers who work for nobles, guildmasters, sovereigns, and anyone else who can afford them.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Once per turn, Dyrwen Blackwing deals an extra 17 ({@dice 5d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Dyrwen Blackwing that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Dyrwen Blackwing doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll. They may change this damage to acid, poison, fire, cold, or lightning at will.

trait.name: Blessing of the Wyrm (4/Short Rest)
entries: When Dyrwen Blackwing damages a creature with Sneak Attack, they may invoke one of the following effects:
Fleeting Fear: The creature must make a DC [8 + CHA + 4] saving throw, or be {@condition frightened} until the start of Dyrwen's next turn.
Repulsion Strike: The creature is pushed 10 ft. away from Dyrwen Blackwing.
Sapping Strike: The creature has disadvantage on all attack rolls it makes before the start of Dyrwen's next turn.

trait.name: Syndicate - Clean Up
entries: Dyrwen Blackwing has advantage against all creatures that have been hit with a duplicate of Syndicate in the past turn.

trait.name: Descent of Dragons
entries: When Dyrwen falls, he can summon spectral draconic wings to allow you to glide, which last until he lands. When he does so, he can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot he descends.

trait.name: Danger Sense
entries: Dyrwen has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that he can see.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Dyrwen is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Dyrwen instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dyrwen makes two attacks with Syndicate.

action.name: Syndicate
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition poisoned} on a failed save. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns and any healing they receive is halved. They may repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn, ending the effect on a success.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Dyrwen may take the Dodge, Disengage, or Dash actions as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Rage (2/Long Rest)
entries: Dyrwen gains advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws and gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. His rage lasts for 1 minute and ends early if he is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if his turn ends and he hasn't attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage since then.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker hits Dyrwen with an attack, he may use his reaction to halve the attack's damage against him.
